020
021import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
022import net.tnemc.core.actions.ActionSource;
023import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.InvalidTransactionException;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026import java.util.UUID;
027
028/**
029 * Represents a record of a successful {@link Transaction transaction}. Similar to how in the real
030 * world we get receipts for completed transactions, these are the same.
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @see Transaction
034 * @since 0.1.2.0
035 */
036public class Receipt {
037
038  //Our archival information
039  private final UUID id;
040  private final long time;
041  private final String type;
042
043  private ActionSource source;
044  private TransactionParticipant from;
045  private TransactionParticipant to;
046  private HoldingsModifier modifierTo;
047  private HoldingsModifier modifierFrom;
048
049  //Our active information that may be modified.
050  private boolean archive = false;
051  private boolean voided = false;
052
053  public Receipt(final UUID id, final long time, final String type) {
054
055    this.id = id;
056    this.time = time;
057    this.type = type;
058  }
059
060  public Receipt(final UUID id, final long time, final Transaction transaction) {
061
062    this.id = id;
063    this.time = time;
064    this.type = transaction.getType();
065    this.source = transaction.getSource();
066
067    this.from = transaction.getFrom();
068    this.modifierFrom = transaction.getModifierFrom();
069    this.to = transaction.getTo();
070    this.modifierTo = transaction.getModifierTo();
071  }
072
073  public boolean voidTransaction() {
074
075    if(voided) return false;
076
077    Transaction transaction = new Transaction("void").source(source);
078
079    if(from != null) {
080
081      final HoldingsModifier modifier = modifierFrom.counter();
082      final BigDecimal tax = (modifier.isRemoval())? from.getTax()
083                                                   : from.getTax().negate();
084      modifier.modifier(tax);
085
086      transaction = transaction.from(from.getId(), modifier);
087    }
088
089    if(to != null) {
090
091      final HoldingsModifier modifier = modifierTo.counter();
092      final BigDecimal tax = (modifier.isRemoval())? to.getTax()
093                                                   : to.getTax().negate();
094      modifier.modifier(tax);
095
096      transaction = transaction.to(to.getId(), modifier);
097    }
098
099    try {
100      transaction.process((transactionResult->{
101        if(transactionResult.isSuccessful()) {
102          this.voided = true;
103        }
104      }));
105    } catch(InvalidTransactionException e) {
106      e.printStackTrace();
107    }
108    return voided;
109  }
110
111  public UUID getId() {
112
113    return id;
114  }
115
116  public long getTime() {
117
118    return time;
119  }
120
121  public String getType() {
122
123    return type;
124  }
125
126  public ActionSource getSource() {
127
128    return source;
129  }
130
131  public void setSource(final ActionSource source) {
132
133    this.source = source;
134  }
135
136  public TransactionParticipant getFrom() {
137
138    return from;
139  }
140
141  public void setFrom(final TransactionParticipant from) {
142
143    this.from = from;
144  }
145
146  public TransactionParticipant getTo() {
147
148    return to;
149  }
150
151  public void setTo(final TransactionParticipant to) {
152
153    this.to = to;
154  }
155
156  public HoldingsModifier getModifierTo() {
157
158    return modifierTo;
159  }
160
161  public void setModifierTo(final HoldingsModifier modifierTo) {
162
163    this.modifierTo = modifierTo;
164  }
165
166  public HoldingsModifier getModifierFrom() {
167
168    return modifierFrom;
169  }
170
171  public void setModifierFrom(final HoldingsModifier modifierFrom) {
172
173    this.modifierFrom = modifierFrom;
174  }
175
176  public boolean isArchive() {
177
178    return archive;
179  }
180
181  public void setArchive(final boolean archive) {
182
183    this.archive = archive;
184  }
185
186  public boolean isVoided() {
187
188    return voided;
189  }
190
191  public void setVoided(final boolean voided) {
192
193    this.voided = voided;
194  }
195}
